fields.description:
Build failed with the follwing error when I set _JAVA_OPTIONS to "-Dfile.encoding=UTF-8":

{code}
extract-functions:

     [xslt] Loading stylesheet /Users/sho/src/apache/hive/pdk/scripts/class-registration.xsl
     [xslt] : Error! Content is not allowed in prolog.
     [xslt] : Error! com.sun.org.apache.xml.internal.utils.WrappedRuntimeException: Content is not allowed in prolog.
     [xslt] Failed to process /Users/sho/src/apache/hive/build/builtins/metadata/class-info.xml

BUILD FAILED

easy workaround: unset _JAVA_OPTIONS

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Build fails with "WrappedRuntimeException: Content is not allowed in prolog." when _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Dfile.encoding=UTF-8"
